add_library(Foundation STATIC ${SRC})

target_include_directories(Foundation PUBLIC
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Include
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Boost
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cmark-gfm/include
    $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${ZLIB_SRC_DIR}>           # zlib.h lives here
    $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${ZLIB_BIN_DIR}>           # generated zconf.h lives here
)
target_link_directories(Foundation PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cmark-gfm/lib)
target_link_libraries(Foundation PUBLIC ZLIB::ZLIB cmark-gfm_static cmark-gfm-extensions_static version ws2_32)
